mapper.update: update t_banner set is_hidden = #{hiddenId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select activity_id from t_banner where activity_id is not null order by create_time desc
select content_id from t_banner where content_id is not null order by create_time desc

select * from ( select banner.id ,con.id as content_id,null as 'activity_id',img.url as url,banner.create_time,banner.title,banner.type,banner.is_hidden from t_content con join t_banner banner on banner.content_id = con.id join m_content_image cim on cim.content_id = con.id join t_image img on cim.image_id = img.id where con.is_delete = 0 and con.type = 2 GROUP BY con.id UNION SELECT banner.id,null,act.id as activity_id,act.img_url as url,banner.create_time,banner.title,banner.type,banner.is_hidden from t_activity act JOIN t_banner banner on banner.activity_id = act.id where act.is_delete = 0 )df order by df.create_time desc

select * from ( select banner.id ,con.id as content_id,null as 'activity_id',img.url as url,banner.create_time,banner.title,banner.type,banner.is_hidden from t_content con join t_banner banner on banner.content_id = con.id join m_content_image cim on cim.content_id = con.id join t_image img on cim.image_id = img.id where con.is_delete = 0 and con.type = 2 GROUP BY con.id UNION SELECT banner.id,null,act.id as activity_id,act.img_url as url,banner.create_time,banner.title,banner.type,banner.is_hidden from t_activity act JOIN t_banner banner on banner.activity_id = act.id where act.is_delete = 0 )df
`title` like concat('%',#{title},'%')
and `is_hidden` like concat('%',#{isHidden},'%')
and `type` like concat('%',#{type},'%')
order by df.create_time desc
